# Emamut - Security Systems Company

> Emamut is a professional security systems company based in Salonta, Bihor County, Romania. We provide complete security solutions for homes and businesses since 2010.

## Company Information

- **Name**: Emamut SRL
- **Founded**: 2010
- **Location**: Str. Horea nr. 26, Salonta, Bihor County, Romania
- **Phone**: +40 735 777 296
- **Email**: contact@emamut.ro
- **Website**: https://emamut.ro
- **Facebook**: https://www.facebook.com/EmamutSRL

## Services

### 1. Video Surveillance Systems (Sisteme Supraveghere Video)
- HD/4K IP and analog cameras
- 24/7 recording with NVR/DVR
- Remote viewing via smartphone/PC
- Night vision (infrared)
- Intelligent motion detection
- Cloud or local storage
- PTZ cameras (pan-tilt-zoom)
- Integration with other security systems

### 2. Anti-Burglary Systems (Sisteme Antiefracție)
- Wireless and hybrid alarm panels
- Volumetric motion sensors
- Magnetic contacts for doors/windows
- Glass break sensors
- Indoor and outdoor sirens
- SMS alerts and app notifications
- Touch screen control panel
- Dispatch center connection possible

### 3. Data Networks / Voice / TV / Wi-Fi (Rețele Date)
- Cat5e/Cat6/Cat6A structured cabling
- RJ45 data outlets
- Switch and router configuration
- Professional Wi-Fi networks
- TV distribution systems
- VoIP telephony
- Racks and patch panels
- Cable testing and certification

### 4. Access Control / Time Tracking (Control Acces / Pontaj)
- RFID/Proximity card readers
- Biometric systems (fingerprint, face)
- PIN code keypads
- Electromagnetic locks
- Electronic time tracking
- Access management software
- Reports and statistics
- HR and payroll integration

### 5. Intercoms / Video Intercoms (Interfoane / Videointerfoane)
- Audio and video intercoms
- Color indoor stations
- Remote door unlock
- Multi-apartment systems
- Smartphone integration
- Wide-angle cameras
- Night vision
- Visitor recording

### 6. Fire Detection Systems (Sisteme Detecție Incendiu)
- Optical smoke detectors
- Heat detectors
- Carbon monoxide detectors
- Addressable fire panels
- Panic/fire buttons
- Evacuation sirens
- Light indicators
- Monitoring and maintenance

## Service Areas

We primarily serve:
- Bihor County (Salonta, Oradea, etc.)
- Arad County
- Timiș County
- Cluj County
- Surrounding regions in Western Romania

## Experience & Credentials

- 15+ years of experience in security systems
- 500+ satisfied clients
- 1000+ completed projects
- Licensed by the General Inspectorate of the Romanian Police
- Approved by the Romanian Intelligence Service

## Why Choose Emamut?

1. **Speed**: We respond quickly and efficiently to customer inquiries
2. **Reliability**: We ensure reliable operation of installed security systems
3. **Efficient Communication**: Transparent communication to understand customer needs
4. **Flexibility**: Quick response to individual project requirements
5. **Quality Equipment**: We work with the latest products and technologies
6. **Warranty & Maintenance**: Full support during and after warranty period

## Languages

We provide services in:
- Romanian (primary)
- Hungarian
- English
